service.query: SELECT B.EVENT_CD AS CODE , A.EVENT_NAME AS NAME FROM DPS.PC_EVTMST A, DPS.PC_STREVT B, MSS.MC_EVTMST C WHERE A.EVENT_CD = B.EVENT_CD AND B.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND B.EVENT_CD = C.EVENT_CD AND A.EVENT_TYPE = 7 AND B.STR_CD = ? AND ? BETWEEN B.EVENT_S_DT AND B.EVENT_E_DT AND C.RECALL_CPN_EVENT_TYPE ='20'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM DPS.PS_TRHEADER WHERE STR_CD = ? AND SALE_DT = ? AND POS_NO =? AND TRAN_NO = ?
SELECT A.CUST_ID , A.CUST_NAME , B.PRSNT_DT , B.PRSNT_NO FROM DCS.DM_CUSTOMER A , MSS.MC_EVTSKUPRSNT B WHERE A.CUST_ID = ? AND A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID(+) ORDER BY B.PRSNT_DT

SELECT C.STR_CD , DPS.FN_GET_STORE_NAME(C.STR_CD) AS STR_NM , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M002',C.EVENT_TYPE) AS EVENT_TYPE --사은행사유형 , B.EVENT_CD , A.EVENT_NAME , B.EVENT_S_DT , B.EVENT_E_DT , D.COMM_NAME1 AS EVENT_TYPE_NM --행사종류 , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M201',C.EVENT_GIFT_CYC) AS EVENT_GIFT_CYC --사은품지급주기 , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M206',C.CUST_ONLY_YN) AS CUST_ONLY_YN --보너스카드 ONLY , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M207',C.CARD_ONLY_YN) AS CARD_ONLY_YN --신용카드 ONLY , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M202',C.RECP_ADD_YN) AS RECP_ADD_YN --영수증합산 , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M203',C.RECP_TODAY_YN) AS RECP_TODAY_YN --영수증당일여부 , C.RECP_ADD_YN AS RECP_YN , C.EVENT_GIFT_CYC AS CYC_DPN , C.RECP_TODAY_YN AS TODAY_YN , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D','M204',C.RECALL_CPN_EVENT_TYPE) AS RECALL_CPN_EVENT_TYPE --리콜행사구분 , C.LIMIT_QTY --한정수량 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MSS.MC_EVTSKUPRSNT A , DPS.PC_EVTMST B WHERE A.EVENT_CD = B.EVENT_CD AND EVENT_TYPE = '7') AS CNT --지급수량 FROM DPS.PC_EVTMST A , DPS.PC_STREVT B , MSS.MC_EVTMST C , COM.TC_COMMCODE D WHERE A.EVENT_CD = B.EVENT_CD AND B.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND B.EVENT_CD = C.EVENT_CD AND A.EVENT_TYPE = '7' AND B.STR_CD = ? AND C.EVENT_CD = ? AND D.COMM_PART = 'P072' AND D.COMM_CODE = A.EVENT_TYPE AND C.RECALL_CPN_EVENT_TYPE ='20' GROUP BY C.STR_CD , C.EVENT_TYPE , B.EVENT_CD , A.EVENT_NAME , B.EVENT_S_DT , B.EVENT_E_DT , D.COMM_NAME1 , C.EVENT_GIFT_CYC , C.CUST_ONLY_YN , C.CARD_ONLY_YN , C.RECP_ADD_YN , C.RECP_TODAY_YN , C.LIMIT_QTY , C.RECALL_CPN_EVENT_TYPE
SELECT SUM(PUMBUN_CD) AS PUMBUN_CD FROM (SELECT DECODE(PUMBUN_CD, '******', 0 , 1) AS PUMBUN_CD FROM MSS.MC_EVTPUMBUN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND EVENT_CD = ?)

SELECT 'F' AS CHK , A.TRG_CD , B.TRG_NAME , A.SKU_CD , C.SKU_NAME , A.BUY_COST_PRC , NVL(D.GIFTCERT_AMT,0) , A.SKU_GB FROM MSS.MC_EVTSKUMST A, MSS.MC_EVTTRGMST B, DPS.PC_SKUMST C ,MSS.MG_GIFTAMTMST D WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.TRG_CD = B.TRG_CD AND A.SKU_CD = C.SKU_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.EVENT_CD = ? AND C.GIFT_AMT_TYPE = D.GIFT_AMT_TYPE(+) AND C.GIFT_TYPE_CD = D.GIFT_TYPE_CD(+) ORDER BY SKU_GB, TRG_CD
SELECT GIFTCARD_NO , GIFTCERT_AMT FROM MSS.MG_GIFTMST WHERE GIFTCARD_NO = ? AND STAT_FLAG = '05'
SELECT MSS.SQ_MC_EVTSKUPRSNT.NEXTVAL AS PRSNT_NO FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO MSS.MC_EVTSKUPRSNT( PRSNT_DT , STR_CD , PRSNT_NO , EVENT_CD , PRSNT_FLAG , SKU_CD , TRG_CD , PRSNT_AMT , EXCP_CONF_ID , EXCP_PRSNT_RSN , PRSNT_QTY , CUST_ID , PRSNT_TIME , CANCEL_GB , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID , EVENT_PRSNT_NO) VALUES( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , ? ,SYSDATE , ? ,SYSDATE , ? , (SELECT NVL(MAX(EVENT_PRSNT_NO),0)+1 FROM MSS.MC_EVTSKUPRSNT WHERE PRSNT_DT = ? AND STR_CD = ? AND EVENT_CD = ?))

INSERT INTO MSS.MC_EVTSKUGIFTPRSNT( PRSNT_DT , STR_CD , PRSNT_NO , SEQ_NO , GIFTCARD_NO , EVENT_CD , SKU_CD , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID , GIFTCERT_AMT) VALUES( ? , ? , ? , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ_NO),0)+1 FROM MSS.MC_EVTSKUGIFTPRSNT WHERE PRSNT_DT = ? AND STR_CD = ? AND PRSNT_NO = ?) , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ?)

SELECT '' AS CHK , A.TRG_CD , B.TRG_NAME , A.SKU_CD , C.SKU_NAME , A.BUY_COST_PRC FROM MSS.MC_EVTSKUMST A, MSS.MC_EVTTRGMST B, DPS.PC_SKUMST C WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.TRG_CD = B.TRG_CD AND A.SKU_CD = C.SKU_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.EVENT_CD = ? AND A.SKU_CD LIKE ? || '%'
